column2:
"Yes, I've received your report.
Your exploration license has been granted.
We look forward to your future success."
"...And that's the end of the script. Now, a word from me."
"In the Desert, powerful Mechs and the harsh environment will stop you from exploring."
"To help you, I will send you a Unit, along with some brief advice."
"You have made a great effort so far. I would hate to see it go to waste."

"This explains enemy attack power.
Just like players, enemies have S-ATK, R-ATK and T-ATK.

As you proceed through the Desert, you will encounter a lot of enemies that use their R-ATK to attack."

"You can reduce damage from enemies by raising your corresponding DEF stat.

S-DEF for S-ATK
R-DEF for R-ATK
T-DEF for T-ATK"

"You can also reduce shooting damage by equipping a Unit with \"Shot Resist\".

Koffie has given you a Sub/Shot Resist a. Equipping it will help tip the scales in your favor when fighting in the Desert."
